Search Algorithm module

Contains the search algorithm used for solving path problems (See PathProblem) (in the context of pipe assembly). Using MCSA* as the score calculation method is recommended.

search_algorithm.find_path(path_problem, draw_path=False, fast_mode=False)

Searches for a solution for the given path problem.

Parameters

  • path_problem¶ (PathProblem) – Path problem to solve.

  • fast_mode¶ (bool) – Slightly faster, but incomplete search. Not recommended.

  • draw_path¶ (bool) – Debug option. If set to True, shows path drawn via matplotlib.pyplot after each node expansion.

Returns

PathProblem when a solution was found, else None.
